column1: The Purple Pig////*Pig Platter:  Our server advised us that this platter wouldn't be more than we could handle.  However
column2: it was quite intimidating when it was set before us.  Ten types of meats along with two pickled sides were laid out on a behemoth wooden tray.  At first we were stunned
column3: but as we slowly sample the meats
column4: we discovered they were so thinly sliced that we weren't getting too stuffed.  Sad to say I can't name all the meats to save my life
column5: but they were all good choices
column6: and the platter was bare when it left the table.
